review_blob: I am not a big fan of Pilsners but I really enojyed this one.  MOst pilsners for me give me a bad aftertaste and heart-burn, but this one does not.  Very suprised by this beer.

Great aroma from the get go.  The only set back is a very strong and lingering aftertaste.  Still trying to get it out of my mouth.  I was very suprised though because I usually dont like a strong tasting beer as this one.
One of my more favorite full bodied Ales.  A deep rich flavor that grows over time.
Not one of my favorite ales.  A lIttle too bitter for my tastes, but it grew on me the more I had.
This beer was a suprise because I bought more as a joke because of the name.  One of the better Ales I have had a while.
